Name: Jupiter Martini
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Bone dry and aromatic, this drink's colour is the grey hue of an overcast sky.
History: A classic which is thought to have originated sometime in the 1920s. Adapted from a recipe in Harry Craddock 's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Jupiter Martini contains 181 calories
